summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; amending Ordinance 102208 authorizing certain traffic control system modernization under the TOPICS Program by deleting the authorization therein for construction of traffic control system improvements at Greenwood Avenue North and North 110th Street, Greenwood Avenue North and North 117th Street, and Rainier Avenue South at South Holly Street and substituting therefor improvements at Roosevelt Way Northeast and Northeast 65th Street and 12th Avenue Northeast and Northeast 65th Street.
